attacks.name: Distort
attacks.effect: Your opponent can't play any Item cards from their hand during their next turn.

attacks.name: Sonic Volume
attacks.effect: Your opponent can't play any Special Energy cards from their hand during their next turn.

attacks.name: Boomburst-GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
